name: Sky Raiders
description: Sky Raiders is a open-world rpg shooter, we'll also have a layer 2 integration which will be used for microtransactions to obtain layer 2 tokens you'll have to lock up layer 1 and layer 2 tokens will be minted and vice versa only will the layer 2 be burnt in such case, all items in game will be tradable on the marketplace for these layer 2 tokens
